title: Package-URL Type Definition
description: Schema to specify a Package-URL (PURL) type as a structured definition.

optional_requirement.title: Component optional requirement
optional_requirement.description: States that this PURL component is optional for a PURL type.

required_requirement.title: Component required requirement
required_requirement.description: States that this PURL component is required for a PURL type.

prohibited_requirement.title: Component prohibited requirement
prohibited_requirement.description: States that this PURL component is prohibited for a PURL type.

purl_component_definition.title: PURL component definition
purl_component_definition.description: PURL component definition properties that apply to most PURL components

permitted_characters.title: Permitted characters in this PURL component
permitted_characters.description: A regular expression (ECMA-262 dialect) defining the 'Permitted characters' for this component of this Package-URL type. If provided, this shall be a subset of the 'Permitted characters' defined in the PURL specification.

case_sensitive.title: Case sensitive
case_sensitive.description: true if this PURL component is case sensitive. If false, the canonical form shall be lowercased.

normalization_rules.title: Normalization rules
normalization_rules.description: List of rules to normalize this component for this PURL type. These are plain text, unstructured rules as some require programming and cannot be enforced only with a schema. Tools are expected to apply these rules programmatically.

native_name.title: Native name
native_name.description: The native name of this PURL component in the package ecosystem. For instance, the 'namespace' for the 'maven' type is 'groupId', and 'scope' for the 'npm' PURL type.

$schema.title: JSON schema
$schema.description: Contains the URL of the JSON schema for Package-URL type definition.

$id.title: PURL type definition id
$id.description: The unique identifier URI for this PURL type definition.

type.title: PURL type
type.description: The type string for this Package-URL type.

type_name.title: Type name
type_name.description: The name for this PURL type.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of this PURL type.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The package repository usage for this PURL type.

use_repository.title: Use repository
use_repository.description: true if this PURL type uses a public package repository.

default_repository_url.title: Default repository URL
default_repository_url.description: The default public repository URL for this PURL type

namespace_definition.title: Namespace definition
namespace_definition.description: Definition of the namespace component for this PURL type. The PURL namespace component shall be required, optional or prohibited for a specific PURL type definition.

requirement.title: Namespace requirement
requirement.description: States that the PURL namespace component is optional, required or prohibited for a PURL type.

name_definition.title: Name definition
name_definition.description: Definition of the name component for this PURL type. The PURL name component is required for all PURL type definitions.

requirement.title: Name component requirement
requirement.description: States that the PURL name component is always required.

version_definition.title: Version definition
version_definition.description: Definition of the version component for this PURL type. The PURL version component is optional for a specific PURL type definition.

requirement.title: Version requirement
requirement.description: States that the PURL version is optional.

qualifiers_definition.title: Qualifiers definition
qualifiers_definition.description: Definition of the qualifiers specific to this PURL type. The PURL qualifiers component is optional for a specific PURL type, but a qualifiers key or keys may be required for a specific PURL type.

items.title: Qualifiers definition
items.description: The definition of a qualifier specific to this PURL type.

requirement.title: Qualifier key requirement
requirement.description: States that a PURL qualifier key is optional or required for a PURL type.

default_value.title: Default value
default_value.description: The optional default value of this qualifier if not provided.

native_name.title: Native name
native_name.description: The equivalent native name for this qualifier key.

subpath_definition.title: Subpath definition
subpath_definition.description: The definition for the subpath for this PURL type. The PURL subpath component is optional for a specific PURL type definition.

requirement.title: Subpath requirement
requirement.description: States that the PURL subpath is optional.

examples.title: PURL examples
examples.description: Example of valid, canonical PURLs for this package type.

reference_urls.title: Reference URLs
reference_urls.description: Optional list of informational reference URLs about this PURL type.
